response.overview: Marcie, a mysterious teenager, is in pursuit of opening a portal with the intention of summoning STRANGE-GRL. Her desire to remove her best friend, Ximena, from reality knows no bounds. However, complying with STRANGE-GRL's demands triggers a dangerous transformation. Fueled by overwhelming envy, Marcie unwittingly becomes a pawn of STRANGE-GRL, all while she remains unaware that using the portal results in an irreversible and grim fate.
response.title: Portals to You
